name: I Can Change The Timeline of Everything
nutshell: “What should I do if the elixir has expired? Don’t be afraid! Just reverse the elixir’s time, I want all of your expired elixirs! What should I do if the cultivation method is too slow? Don’t be afraid! Just adjust the cultivation time forwards by hundreds of years, the cultivation method will be successfully mastered immediately. What if the growth of Spiritual Grass is too slow? Don’t be afraid! Just accelerate the growth time of the Spiritual Grass by tens of thousands of years, and the Spiritual Grass immediately becomes a Divine plant. Traveling to another world and discovering that you are a waste material? Don’t be afraid! I can change the timeline of everything!”

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Gaiden - Missing Link
nutshell:
In the midst of the Universal Century’s raging One Year War, there is a shadowy unit that purges the Federation of wrongdoers!
The long-awaited first volume of the manga adaptation of the Mobile Suit Gundam Gaiden Missing Link from the popular game "Mobile Suit Gundam Side Stories" by Namco Bandai Games!

name: Love Wars
nutshell:
From Fantasyshrine:
Stylist Arata has been secretly in love with Masanobu for 8 years. However, their relationship has never gone beyond friendship. Meanwhile, Masanobu’s eldest son, Masaomi, has unexpectedly confessed to him. “Since I was little, I’ve been wanting you, Arata—“ Under his manly, demanding kiss, Arata couldn’t help falling for the eldest son of the man he loves…!? How in the world… A homey love story!!

name: Jujutsu Kaisen Official Fan Book
nutshell: Written and organized by Gege Akutami, this official fan book offers a unique never-before-seen glimpse into the Jujutsu Kaisen world! Delve into the personal details of over 70 characters through a generous array of 350+ questions, all answered by Gege himself! Fans can also look forward to extra background information, exclusive interviews, and even an art trade with Tite Kubo, the author of the hit series, "BLEACH"! This book is a must read for all Jujutsu Kaisen fans!

name: The First Favourite Marriage of the Star Empire
nutshell: He was attacked by the enemy, but he was tagged by his saviour! He is an Imperial Major General of the intergalactic world, a handsome man with money and power, and after being marked, he is his man. But Luo Luo said no! He has to control his own destiny, so Luo Luluo decided to run away, to study and to strengthen himself! Just …… eh how to meet again? The handsome major general put his arm around Luo Luolu's waist and declared that Luo Luolu could not escape because she was his exclusive medicine …

name: Deathly Popular Student Council Prez Wants to Cool Off
nutshell: a bela presidente estudantil tem um segredo que ninguém sabe

name: Swing-Style
nutshell:
Do you know that there are sites written about the bonds of couples on the Internet that you are bored with ordinary everyday life? That name is swing-style.net. Men and women gather for seeking deeper love and more hot stimuli.
Included one-shot:
Volume 2: Koibito, Ura Kyoto Makai Annai

name: Shingeki no Kyojin - Nightmare Eruli (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairing: Erwin Smith x Levi Ackerman
The artist published an English version on their Pixiv account.

name: The Empress' Poor-quality Special Effects
nutshell: Wu Sheyue is a cosmetics specialist/assassin. One day, her organization decided to kill her. Though she was stabbed, she survived, and travelled back to the past, into the body of a “mad” girl. There, she uses her wits and skills to become the Empress.

name: Tetsuya Chiba Short Stories - Shojo Manga
nutshell: A collection of two shojo short-serials and a one-shot from Tetsuya Chiba. Part of a three-volume short stories series, alongside a volume of his shonen work and his essay manga. Includes "Papa's Bride", "Jumbo Rico", and "Like the Wind".

name: Dear Shimazaki in the Peaceful Land
Touhou - Chirei de (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A story of the inhabitants Palace of the Earth Spirits before the events of Subterranean Animism. Told with humor and feeling in a unique drawing style. Take place before the event of Subterranean Animism, and Koishi Komeiji still hasn't close her 3rd eye.

name: Long Good-bye, My Honey
nutshell: Taking place in the Grand Finale Station, where the deceased find themselves once they’ve passed, this is the story of a young girl who finds something precious between life and death.

name: Girls und Panzer - Anchovy-neesan's Extra Large Military Operation (Doujinshi)
Futureman Kaos
nutshell:
Koji Sunami and Jo Daigo are childhood friends, who together take the exam to get into the prestigious Milky Way Academy. However, Koji passes and Daigo fails. A mysterious man offers Daigo a place in the academy and a high-ranking position, but only if he kills Koji. He accepts, but Koji is helped by a mysterious girl and is revived. He returns ten years later to find Daigo in great power, and is sent by him to the prison planet Chaos.

Volumes 131-133 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: Mask - Kamen no Jouji
nutshell:
Mask — Kamen no Jouji: Ria works as a hostess, and she longs for the day when the owner, Himi Kyouji, and herself can finally be together. On the other hand, 10 years ago, when Kyouji forced Ria’s beloved parents to commit suicide and robbed her of her happiness, she planned to get her revenge. However, after she is hugged by him, what will happen to her revenge?!


Feelings of First Love: Morino lost the opportunity to confess to her childhood friend Yukihiro on the day of their school graduation. Five years down the line, when she ends up at the same company where he works, can she finally reconcile with her first love?


Snowflake in the Snow: Yui returns to her hometown to attend her brother's wedding after seven years. Shun, her first boyfriend seems as much in love with her as he was before, but is she willing to overcome her differences with her family and move back?


Indulging in the Moon

name: Strange Bug Kabuton
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Kabuton is mean and loves pranks, and Guriguri is a good-natured fellow who can only play small pranks. They make a whale swim by filling up a baseball field with water, or catch an angler from the sea using money or a lunch box as bait!!

name: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso - Coda
nutshell: A short story collection from Kousei and Tsubaki's childhood.

name: Yo-kai Watch Forever Friends
nutshell: New movie manga in Monthly Corocoro magazine.

name: Puchimon
nutshell: Adventures of Melty and friends that attend an academy in order to become questers!

name: One Step Toward Freedom
nutshell: Our Main Character was transported to another world and the first thing that happened thing to him was that he was forced into a marriage….

name: Honey Come Chatka!!
nutshell:
The new stars of the era have risen!! This new era of J-POP starts with Honey Come Chatka!!
A girl born to be a diva, Sachi!
A perfect dancer with a body to match, Tayo!
An unrivaled genius on the turntable, DJ Copy and Paste!
Their biggest fans, Chakapi and Calimero!
Currently being translated on danbooru: https://danbooru.donmai.us/pools/11100

name: Thoroughbred wa Yuruganai
nutshell: The thoroughbred, Shiba Toshimasa, and the lion, Shishidou Ouga, are childhood friends and now lovers. But, as the son of a good family, Shiba faces the talk about an engagement to his thoroughbred friend, Touma Rei. Although he asked Touma to reject the engagement, Shishidou finds out about it…?!

name: Koi no Shikata, Oshiete Kudasai
nutshell: Yamaoka is forced to attend a language school by his company. This is where he meets a beautiful Korean instructor who begins to give him secret private lessons!?

name: The Celestial Cheater
tags: Action,Long Strip,Martial Arts,Adventure,Virtual Reality,Video Games,Fantasy,Full Color
nutshell:
A virtual reality platform for gamers to fight as magicians, warriors, healers, and whichever fighting class they choose.
However, the fight has spread beyond the internet, escalating into real bloodshed. In reality, our male lead fell victim right before the final round of the game’s ultimate championship.
He closed his eyes, vowing to seek revenge. He re-opened his eyes, a new day had dawned—a “new” day, two years ago, right before the game was officially released. Memories of the past two years, predictions for the next two years, he who relived it all shall rule it all!

name: The Witches' Isle
nutshell:
Hannah, a tutor, receives a high paying job offer at a mansion on a remote island.
There, she meets the young and kind owner, Ian, and his younger sister, Hannah's soon-to-be student, Ailee.
A tutor's fresh start working on an island. However, when strange things begin to occur at the seemingly peaceful mansion, she finds that there's more to it than meets the eye.
Gradually, Hannah discovers the secret between the two siblings and the island itself…
※GL is included in the love triangle for this series and is being partly covered within the story.

name: The Horse Goes On!
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Bakuro, a.k.a. Kazamatsuri Kuro, wanders around town with a bag in his hand. But when he walks through town, not only beautiful women, but also men come up to him. It seems that they are after the contents of the bag of Bakuro, the sergeant of a large conglomerate. ......? This is a story about money and women in the 1970s, which the creator himself says, "This is a rare "sex-focused" manga" that I remember fondly."

name: Hiyorigeta
nutshell: Sato and Hiyoko's trip to the hot springs.

name: Shiawase Kanako no Koroshiya Seikatsu
nutshell:
Nishino Kanako sure hates her job, and is only too happy to snag the first new gig that comes her way. She never expected that her interview would be at an agency for contract killers…or that she’d be really, really good at bumping people off! Kanako doesn’t have a ton of self-confidence, and adjusting to her new life as an assassin isn’t the easiest. Will she ever earn the respect of Sakurai, her prickly but kinda hot new coworker? Find out in this dangerously funny, full-color manga! [Seven Seas]


Author's Twitter
Author's Pixiv
